feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Blue/green deployments on Azure Spring Apps
entry.summary: This article describes a high-availability blue/green deployment solution for applications on Azure Spring Apps.

entry.title: Azure Spring Apps (ASA) architecture design
entry.summary: Get started on your Azure Spring Apps journey by reviewing guidance ranging from "just starting out" to production.

entry.title: Azure Spring Apps integrated with landing zones
entry.summary: Reference architecture for Spring Boot applications hosted in Azure Spring Apps. The application is deployed in an Azure landing zone so that the workload can use shared resources managed by central teams of an organization.

entry.title: Deploy Azure Spring Apps to multiple regions
entry.summary: Deploy Azure Spring Apps instances in multiple regions for increased availability, resilience, and performance.

entry.title: Azure Spring Apps baseline architecture
entry.summary: Deploy Azure Spring Apps instances in multiple zones for increased availability, resilience, and performance.

entry.title: Baseline highly available zone-redundant app services web application
entry.summary: A baseline reference architecture for a network secured, highly available, and zone-redundant App Service web application.

entry.title: Siemens Teamcenter baseline architecture
entry.summary: Learn about the Siemens Teamcenter product lifecycle management (PLM) solution architecture in Azure.

entry.title: DataOps for autonomous vehicle operations
entry.summary: Use Azure services to build an offline data operations and data management (DataOps) solution for an automated driving system.

entry.title: Use Teamcenter PLM with Azure NetApp Files
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure NetApp Files as a storage solution for Siemens Teamcenter product lifecycle management (PLM).

entry.title: Carrier-grade voicemail solution on Azure
entry.summary: An example of a carrier-grade solution design that focuses on highly reliability using Azure services.

entry.title: Implement TIC 3.0 compliance
entry.summary: Implement Trusted Internet Connection (TIC) 3.0 compliance for your internet-facing Azure applications and services, and improve the user experience.

entry.title: DR for Azure Data Platform - Overview
entry.summary: First article in a series covering disaster recovery for an Azure data platform

entry.title: DR for Azure Data Platform - Scenario details
entry.summary: Third article in a series covering disaster recovery for an Azure data platform

entry.title: Model loan credit risk and default probability
entry.summary: Use Azure Machine Learning, Azure Synapse Analytics, App Service, and Power BI to model loan credit risk and default probability.

entry.title: Types of decision APIs and Applied AI Services
entry.summary: Learn about Cognitive Services Decision APIs, which can help you make recommendations for decision-making, and Applied AI Services, which provides NLP features.

entry.title: Types of language API services
entry.summary: Learn about using Azure Cognitive Service for Language to understand and analyze text. Learn which service to use for a specific use case.

entry.title: Types of speech API services
entry.summary: Learn about the Azure Cognitive Services Speech service, which provides speech-to-text and text-to-speech capabilities.

entry.title: Types of vision API services
entry.summary: Learn about using Cognitive Service for Vision to understand and analyze images and video. Learn which service to use for a specific use case.

entry.title: Running Windows containers on AKS
entry.summary: Supplementary article to the AKS Baseline reference architecture providing guidance on running Windows containers on AKS

entry.title: Contextualize data by using graph in SQL Database
entry.summary: Learn how to contextualize data by looking up context that's stored in a graph database in SQL Database.

entry.title: Microsoft SaaS stories
entry.summary: Collection of insightful interviews featuring Microsoft partners who have embarked on their unique software as a service (SaaS) journey.

entry.title: Deploy Revit on an Azure virtual machine
entry.summary: Learn how Autodesk Revit building information modeling software performs on an Azure virtual machine.

entry.title: Deploy and operate apps with AKS hybrid on Azure Stack HCI or Windows Server
entry.summary: Build an app deployment pipeline for containerized apps on AKS hybrid that are running on Azure Stack HCI or Windows Server.

entry.title: Massive-scale VWAN architecture design
entry.summary: Learn about the architecture for a massive-scale Azure Virtual WAN deployment that has multiple hubs per region.

entry.title: Conversation summarization
entry.summary: Learn how to generate summaries of customer–agent interactions by using the Azure OpenAI GPT-3 model.

entry.title: Integrate Teradata VantageCloud Enterprise with Azure Data Factory
entry.summary: Learn how to use Teradata VantageCloud Enterprise together with Azure Data Factory to develop data integration pipelines.

entry.title: Implement logging and monitoring for Azure OpenAI large language models
entry.summary: Implement comprehensive logging and monitoring and enhanced security for Azure OpenAI Service large language models.

entry.title: Choose a cognitive services technology
entry.summary: Learn about Azure cognitive services that you can use in AI applications and data flows. Choose the appropriate service for your use case.

entry.title: Baseline architecture for an AKS cluster
entry.summary: Reference architecture for a baseline infrastructure that deploys an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster.

entry.title: Send Databricks app logs to Azure Monitor
entry.summary: Learn how to send application logs and metrics from Azure Databricks to a Log Analytics workspace using the Azure Databricks Monitoring Library.

entry.title: Dashboards to visualize Azure Databricks metrics
entry.summary: Learn how to set up a Grafana dashboard to monitor performance of Azure Databricks jobs. Azure Databricks is an Apache Spark-based analytics service.

entry.title: Observability patterns and metrics
entry.summary: Learn how to use observability patterns and metrics to improve the processing performance of a big data system using Azure Databricks.

entry.title: Troubleshoot Databricks performance issues
entry.summary: Use Grafana monitoring dashboards to troubleshoot performance bottlenecks in Apache Spark jobs on Azure Databricks.

entry.title: Deploy SAS Grid 9.4 on Azure NetApp Files
entry.summary: Learn about running SAS Grid 9.4 on Azure, using Azure NetApp Files for SASDATA storage, and about storage options for SASWORK.

entry.title: AKS triage - cluster health
entry.summary: Learn to check the overall health of an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster, as part of a triage step for AKS clusters.

entry.title: SaaS and multitenant solution architecture
entry.summary: This guide provides an overview of the architectural content for SaaS, startups, and multitenancy.

entry.title: Overview of the journey for designing SaaS and multitenant solutions
entry.summary: This guide provides an overview of the journey to create a SaaS solution. It also provides links to resources used in many SaaS, multitenant, Azure Marketplace, and ISV & Startup scenarios.

entry.title: SMA OpCon in Azure
entry.summary: Use SMA Technologies OpCon in a Kubernetes configuration to automate Azure and on-premises workloads that run on various servers across an enterprise.

entry.title: Query-based document summarization
entry.summary: Implement query-based document summarization by using the Azure OpenAI GPT-3 model. Review two example use cases.

entry.title: Guide to Private Link and DNS in Azure Virtual WAN
entry.summary: Learn how to implement DNS to support private endpoints in a Virtual WAN network. In these scenarios, every Virtual WAN hub has a firewall that has DNS proxy enabled.

entry.title: Single region scenario - Private Link and DNS in Azure Virtual WAN
entry.summary: This article provides guidance on implementing DNS to support private endpoints in a Virtual WAN network in a single region where the virtual hub has a Firewall with DNS Proxy enabled. The solution includes implementing a virtual WAN hub extension for DNS.

entry.title: Virtual hub extension pattern
entry.summary: This article describes a pattern for exposing shared services, such as DNS, in a hub-and-spoke topology that uses Azure Virtual WAN.

entry.title: Automated scheduling and dispatching for semiconductor manufacturing
entry.summary: Learn about automated scheduling and dispatching for semiconductor manufacturing workloads on Azure.

entry.title: Secure tunneling with Azure Relay
entry.summary: Establish enhanced-security bidirectional connections to edge devices without making significant changes to the firewall or network configuration on the edge.

entry.title: Azure landing zones - Azure Virtual Desktop landing zone design considerations
entry.summary: Design considerations for using the enterprise-scale Azure Virtual Desktop landing zone, which is part of the Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure.

entry.title: Migrate a simple app from Service Fabric to AKS
entry.summary: Use an example to guide the migration of your application from Azure Service Fabric to Azure Kubernetes Service.

entry.title: Migrate your workload from Service Fabric to AKS
entry.summary: Compare AKS to Service Fabric and learn best practices for transitioning from Service Fabric to AKS.

entry.summary: Learn how to scale out your Azure IoT solution to support millions of devices.

entry.title: Use AI to forecast customer orders
entry.summary: Learn how to use AI and machine learning to forecast a customer's future order quantity for a specific SKU.

entry.title: Azure VMware Solution networking
entry.summary: Get started with Azure VMware Solution foundation block networking. Understand what networking solution options exist and how to choose between them.

entry.summary: Use Profisee to migrate from SQL Server Master Data Services to a full-featured master data management (MDM) platform in the Azure cloud.

entry.title: Publish internal APIs to external users
entry.summary: In this scenario, an organization consolidates multiple APIs internally using Azure API Management deployed inside a Virtual Network.

entry.summary: Learn about high-performance computing (HPC) on Azure, which uses many CPU or GPU-based computers to solve complex mathematical tasks.

entry.summary: Elastic Enterprise Search streamlines search for all work documents and data. Learn how to deploy it and optimize productivity.

entry.summary: Integrate the Profisee master data management platform with Microsoft Purview to govern and manage data. Produce and deliver high-quality, trusted data.

entry.summary: Recommended architecture for implementing a simple enterprise integration pattern using Azure Logic Apps and Azure API Management.

entry.title: Enhanced-security hybrid messaging — client access
entry.summary: Enhance your security in a client access scenario by using Azure AD Multi-Factor Authentication.

entry.title: Automate PDF forms processing
entry.summary: Use Azure services such as Azure Form Recognizer, Azure Logic Apps, and Azure Functions to implement cost-effective and flexible automated PDF processing.

entry.summary: Avoid data silos by using a recommended structure for collections in a Microsoft Purview federated catalog.

entry.summary: Use this guide to decide which storage service best suits your application.

entry.title: Index file content and metadata by using Azure Cognitive Search
entry.summary: Build an Azure Cognitive Search index by using file content from Azure Blob Storage and metadata from Azure Table Storage.

entry.title: Mainframe file and tape backup to Azure using Luminex
entry.summary: Use Luminex products to transfer mainframe file and tape data to and from Azure to meet backup, archival, and other business needs.

entry.title: Using Azure Active Directory B2C in a multitenant architecture
entry.summary: Learn about considerations and approaches for using Azure Active Directory B2C in a multitenant architecture.

entry.title: Subscription vending implementation guidance
entry.summary: Subscription vending automation implementation guidance. Subscription vending standardizes the process for requesting, deploying, and governing subscriptions, so application teams can deploy their workloads faster.

entry.title: Run CAE simulations for manufacturing on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to use a high-performance computing (HPC) environment on Azure to run CAE simulations for manufacturing.

entry.title: Autonomous Vehicle Operations (AVOps) design guide
entry.summary: Get an overview about using Azure services to build an Autonomous Vehicle Operations (AVOps) solution.

entry.summary: Learn about an architecture that you can use to build automated driving solution by using Azure services.

entry.title: Protect access tokens in a single-page application by using Azure API Management
entry.summary: Implement a No Token in the Browser architecture for a JavaScript single-page application using API Management.

entry.summary: See an architecture that protects backend APIs by using API Management and Azure AD B2C to validate bearer tokens. The APIs can be in Azure or other environments.

entry.title: Line of business extension
entry.summary: Modernize legacy systems by automating processes. Schedule calculations, connect to third party data sources or legacy systems, and process and share data.

entry.summary: Deploy SWIFT Alliance Lite2 on Azure. Migrate an existing deployment from on-premises or create a new deployment.

entry.summary: Learn about SWIFT Alliance Connect Virtual components that can be deployed on Azure.

entry.title: Azure service retry guidance
entry.summary: Learn about the retry mechanism features for many Azure services. Retry mechanisms differ because services have different characteristics and requirements.

entry.title: CI/CD pipeline for chatbots with ARM templates
entry.summary: Use Azure Pipelines and ARM templates to set up a CI/CD pipeline to deploy a chatbot app and its infrastructure as code with Azure App and Azure Bot services.

entry.title: Background jobs guidance
entry.summary: Learn about background tasks that run independently of the user interface, such as batch jobs, intensive processing tasks, and long-running processes.

entry.title: Azure App Service and Azure Functions considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure App Service and Azure Functions that are useful when working with multitenanted systems, and links to guidance and examples for how to use Azure App Service and Azure Functions in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Deploy Azure landing zones
entry.summary: Deployment options for platform and application landing zones in Azure.

entry.title: High-availability Kubernetes with Azure Stack Hub
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Stack Hub to create a high-availability Kubernetes cluster solution on Azure.

entry.title: Reliable web app pattern for .NET - Apply the pattern
entry.summary: How to migrate your .NET application to the cloud with minimal code changes. Plan and apply low-cost, high-value updates to your .NET application.

entry.title: Scale AI and machine learning initiatives in regulated industries
entry.summary: Learn about scaling Azure AI and machine learning environments that must comply with extensive security policies.

entry.title: Multitenant SaaS on Azure
entry.summary: Build a multitenant SaaS solution on Azure, designed for high availability, scalability, data security and isolation using the App Service and Azure Kubernetes Service.

entry.title: Master data management with Profisee and Azure Data Factory
entry.summary: Integrate Profisee master data management with Azure Data Factory to deliver high-quality, trusted data for Azure Synapse and all analytic applications.

entry.title: GitOps for Azure Kubernetes Service
entry.summary: Learn techniques for using GitOps principles to operate and manage an Azure Kubernetes Services (AKS) cluster. The solutions use Flux v2 and Argo CD.

entry.title: DevOps checklist
entry.summary: Use this checklist to assess your DevOps culture and process. DevOps integrates development, QA, and IT operations into a unified set of processes.

entry.title: DevSecOps with GitHub Security
entry.summary: Learn how GitHub tools like Codespaces and Actions make security practices an integral part of DevOps while maintaining efficiency in an Azure framework.

entry.title: Connected factory signal processing pipeline
entry.summary: See a connected factory signal processing pipeline with a common configuration interface to connect brownfield and modern IoT devices through an OPC UA gateway.

entry.title: Azure DevTest Labs architecture for enterprises
entry.summary: Learn about the architecture that can help you deploy a solution based on Azure DevTest Labs in your enterprise.

entry.title: Considerations when using domain names in a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes the considerations you need to give to domain names when building multitenant web applications.

entry.title: Tenant lifecycle considerations in a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes the different stages of a tenant lifecycle, and considerations for each stage.

entry.title: Considerations for updating a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes considerations for updating your multitenant solution.

entry.title: Deploy highly available Kubernetes cluster on Azure Stack Hub
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy a Kubernetes cluster solution for high availability using Azure and Azure Stack Hub.
